name: Lawnmower Game: Next Generation
summary: In Lanwmower game you drive lawnmower and cut grass in a big open world which contain grass, houses and other obstacles! Drive lawnmower in open world and cut every cuttable grass right in front of you. After cutting all grass, it will respawn - the game loop is endless. Lawnmower has also fuel consumptio mechanics. Pick-up Jerry cans and add fuel. If you run out of fuel you will respawn at the starting location. Enjoy the game, cut all the grass and be the Lawnmower King!
